Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "Kamui is on the stage already? Didn't expect it to go so smoothly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Chaofeng must have made some arrangements ahead of time.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Didn\'t expect the "helpers" Chaofeng mentioned to be the Gray Raven Squad, though. I wonder if your superiors already knew?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "I only found out myself just now. How did my brother's crew get here? They should have been on missions in a different area.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'By the way, Murray, are you not going to greet Lee and the other Gray Ravens?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "It's fine, I'm happy just watching my brother from afar. Besides, it's kind of fun like this.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A considerable number of people have gathered at the trade venue, and mechanical puppets on patrol. With every new "construct display" that appears on stage, the crowd oohs and ahhs.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "They're all trapped in this place, yet they're excited as ever for this event. Are they being controlled—or are they poisoned by this dream?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Chrome is still deep in thought when the mechanical puppet MC announces the next number—Kamui's. Kamui and Murray turn to look at the stage."}
{3: 'Kamui, dressed in feminine clothing, and Lucia, wearing something she ordinarily would not.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "Heh, so I guess my brother's squad had the same idea.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Murray seems to be enjoying this, while Chrome is checking for potential threats through his specialized device. He glances at the stage to see—'}
{3: 'As much as Chrome wants to yell at Kamui, all he can do is gesture wildly at him to stop acting so "unladylike."'}
{3: '...To which Kamui flashes Chrome a thumbs-up.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Lucia, Chrome is telling me to beat you in this.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The very next second, Kamui lifts his skirt, and the crowd responds with deafening cheers.'}
{3: "Mistaking Chrome's enraged shouting as cheers, Kamui starts giving his all in his performance."}
{3: 'The venue quiets down instantly. Right after this, a Kowloong Crew member dressed just like Chaofeng appears and pulls open the curtains concealing the upper stage.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'It must be Qu, the person Chaofeng mentioned.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'My brother—I mean, Gray Raven—probably has something planned. Should we make a distraction for them?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After the conversation, Chrome rips open his clothes to reveal the scythe he had kept hidden. The audience flees in different directions in horror.'}
{3: 'The mechanical puppets have Chrome and Kamui surrounded, while the Kowloong Crew are pursuing the Gray Raven squad.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chaofeng', 3: "Gray Raven's destination should be the main control room as well. Let's take out these puppets and head over.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "It's going to take some time, though.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "You're here to help us? Specially for us?", 4: '1'}
